text: The 1991 Big Eight Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 8–10 at Kemper Arena in Kansas City, Missouri. Fourth-seeded Missouri defeated #3 seed Nebraska in the championship game, 90–82. The Tigers were ineligible to play in the 1991 NCAA Tournament. Kansas, Oklahoma State, and Nebraska received at- large bids. ==Bracket== ==References== Tournament Category:Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1991 Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
